title: WhatsApp and WHO create a chatbot to share reliable coronavirus info

author: Muhammad Jarir Kanji

author: Robert Gearty
title: Africa's mountain gorillas face coronavirus risk
description: The coronavirus is putting at risk another vulnerable species, Africa’s endangered mountain gorillas, prompting the closure of a large national park that is home to a third of those gorillas in the world.
content:

author: COLLEEN LONG, MICHAEL BALSAMO and RODNEY MUHUMUZA
title: Coronavirus-related crimes capitalize on global fear, panic
description: Hate groups encourage sick members to infect law enforcement officers. As the coronavirus pandemic spreads, so too do the crimes related to it — transgressions that capitalize on fear, panic and the urge to lay blame, and add to the burden on law enforcement …

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Uganda, usually welcoming to refugees, bars all new arrivals to contain coronavirus
description: Uganda said on Wednesday it had closed its borders to all new refugee arrivals as part of efforts to contain the new coronavirus in a country which has long kept its doors open to those fleeing conflict and other troubles in the region.
